author: 网易
title: 梁园区 公厕换新颜 "方便"更卫生|绿化|洗手池|公共厕所_网易订阅
text:
灰瓦白墙，具有典型的豫东古建筑风格，在神火大道与团结路交叉口西南角的这处公共厕所完成升级改造之后，给人眼前一亮的感觉。3月12日，记者发现，该公共厕所升级改造之后，不但大幅度增加了厕间，而且还提升了多方面的设施，让广大市民方便的事情变得更加方便了。
“这处公共厕所升级改造完成后，如同一处好看的古建筑。”家住附近的居民马涛说，升级后的公共厕所厕间增加了不少，可以更好地满足市民如厕的需求。
记者看到，这处公共厕所不但外观更加美观，而且在功能上也更加贴近民生。以往设置在厕间内的洗手池有了单独的盥洗间，而且考虑到儿童洗手的需求，洗手池分为高低不同的标准，更好地关爱了儿童。
“以前这里的公共厕所建于2013年，已经投入十多年，主体结构腐蚀、损坏严重，地面塌陷，安全隐患较大，已无维修价值。”梁园区城市管理局环境卫生事务中心公厕管理东站西片区片长张靖昊说，为了更好地服务市民，提升公共厕所设施，对该处和附近步行街的另外一处公共厕所重新建设，“新建设的公共厕所不但扩大了一倍厕间，而且在外观、内部洁具、绿化等方面均有提升及体现，此外还具有儿童友好、残疾人无障碍等方面的考量。”
记者了解到，按照2024年省、市重点民生实事任务清单，梁园区城市管理局在公共厕所管理方面，已翻新修缮老旧公共厕所100处，整体提升公共厕所25处，迁移公共厕所2处，新建公共厕所1处。结合城市发展总体规划及广大市民对于公共厕所的需求，该局以公共厕所补建、提档升级为重点，拓展公共厕所文化等多种功能，打造地标式城市新名片，彻底颠覆人们对公共厕所脏、臭、差的旧思想观念，不仅有效缓解了群众“如厕难”问题，更通过技术创新与制度完善的双轮驱动，探索出城市公共服务提质增效的新路径。
来源：商丘日报

author: Reuters
title: Hawaiian Electric's Rapid Response Restores Power in Downtown Honolulu | Headlines
text: Hawaiian Electric's Rapid Response Restores Power in Downtown Honolulu Hawaiian Electric has successfully completed all major repairs to restore power to customers in the Chinatown and downtown Honolulu areas that were affected by Monday’s outage. This swift action ensures that the community's electricity needs are promptly met and daily life can proceed without further disruptions. author: Via Illinois State University Athletics,
title: Jones Named MIC Co-Newcomer of the Week - NewsBreak
text:
By Via Illinois State University Athletics, ,
1 days ago NORMAL, Ill. – The Illinois State gymnastics team is two meets into the 2025 season, and it is already receiving stellar performances from a key newcomer in transfer Jaly Jones who was named the Midwest Independent Conference Co-Newcomer of the Week on Wednesday by the conference. Jones shared the weekly honor with Kyleigh Ghanbari of Texas Woman's in the first awards presentation of the year. The Redbirds posted a second-place finish last week and recorded a season-high score of 195.100 at the Next Level Gymnastics Podium Challenge in Battle Creek, Michigan. Jones was a big reason for that success, as... Read full article

author: Svyatenko Tamara
title: Ukraine will be covered by frost the forecaster told what to expect on the weekend
text:
Ukraine will be covered by frost: the forecaster told what to expect on the weekend.
Weather in Ukraine: cold snap and strong wind
On Saturday, December 14, a cold snap is expected throughout Ukraine, accompanied by strong winds. This was reported by forecaster Nataliya Didenko.
Thus, the nearest night is expected to be 7-12 degrees below zero. In Ternopil, Khmelnytskyi, and Vinnytsia regions, a region of the lowest air temperature will temporarily form - in some places up to -14 degrees.
'Tomorrow afternoon, in most regions of Ukraine, temperatures are expected to range from 2 to 5 degrees below zero, while in Odesa, Crimea, and Transcarpathia it will be around zero degrees. December 14 will pass without precipitation across Ukraine, both at night and during the day. However, a strong southwestern wind is expected,' said Nataliya Didenko.
In Kyiv on Saturday, dry frosty windy weather is expected. At night, the temperature will drop to about -10°C, and during the day it will be 3-5 below zero. However, there may be sunny clearings.
It is worth noting that on Friday, December 13, cloudy weather with clearings is forecasted in Ukraine. In some areas, there will be light precipitation in the form of snow. There will be icy conditions on the roads in places. The wind is northwestern at 7-12 m/s, and in Ukraine, except for the west, gusts will reach 15-20 m/s.
Meanwhile, according to the forecaster, on Sunday, December 15, it will warm up to thawing. Throughout the day, frost will retreat, but cloudiness will increase and precipitation will appear mainly in the form of snow and wet snow. Next week, the maximum air temperature will reach 2-7 degrees Celsius.
By the way, the Copernicus Climate Center (C3S) reported that November was the second warmest in history after November last year.
